trans-unit.source: Provides access to get and set option values for a designer.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a value that enables or disables in-place editing for <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> controls.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if in-place editing for <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> controls is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the dimensions of a grid unit.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the dimensions of a grid unit.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a designer shows a component's smart tag panel automatically on creation.
A component's smart tag panel is set to automatically open when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.AutoShow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true`.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow a component's smart tag panel to open automatically upon creation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that enables or disables the grid in the designer.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the grid is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that enables or disables whether controls are automatically placed at grid coordinates.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if snapping is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that enables or disables the component cache.
The component cache is a performance enhancement that is incompatible with certain designers.
You can disable it with this property.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component cache is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that enables or disables smart tags in the designer.
This option is not exposed on the **Options** item of the **Tools** menu in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)].
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if smart tags in the designer are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that enables or disables snaplines in the designer.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if snaplines in the designer are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
